predicate.note: Frames file for 'tangle' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to mix or twist together, drag in

example.name: all arguments
example.text: The flying telephone : `` You tangle the base cord around a chair leg , and the receiver does seem [*-1] to fly off . ''

example.name: passive
example.text: But again , the themes get tangled [*-1] in Mr. Mahfouz 's elliptical storytelling .

example.name: all tangled up
example.text: FBI initially showed little interest, and he had the impression other federal security agencies were tangled [*-100] up in legal red tape.
